title: Choking (Adult)
summary: Perform Heimlich maneuver if conscious and cannot breathe.
steps: If cannot speak/cough, stand behind them and give abdominal thrusts.
Repeat until object is expelled or person becomes unconscious.
warnings: Do not perform abdominal thrusts on an unconscious person.

title: Severe Bleeding
summary: Control bleeding with firm pressure and elevation.
steps: Apply direct pressure with a clean cloth.
Elevate limb above heart level if possible.
If bleeding persists, apply pressure bandage and seek emergency help.
warnings: Do not remove embedded objects; pad around them.

title: Burns (Minor)
summary: Cool burn with running water and cover loosely.
steps: Cool under running water for 10–20 minutes.
Seek medical help for larger or deep burns.
warnings: Do not apply ice, butter, or toothpaste.
